brand_identity.name: SoftBook
design_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix 'Medical Cleanliness' with 'Spa Warmth'
Emotion First: Every click should feel reassuring
Content is King: The booking flow is a narrative, not a form
Zoom In: Focus on the service details and time slots
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce anxiety during booking

rules: Headings (h1-h3): MUST use 'tracking-tight' (-0.025em) to make Inter look premium
Headings Weight: Use 'font-semibold' or 'font-medium', avoid 'font-bold' for a softer look
Body Text: Use 'text-slate-600' for better readability than pure black

tailwind_config_update.instructions: Update /app/frontend/src/index.css :root variables to match these hex codes exactly. Ensure dark mode variables are also set (use slate-900 for bg, slate-800 for cards).

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

grid_strategy.dashboard: Mode B: The Control Room. grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3 lg:grid-cols-4. Gap-6.
grid_strategy.booking_page: The Focused Tunnel. Centered max-w-md or max-w-2xl container. Single column.

layout.border_radius: rounded-xl (12px) for cards, rounded-lg (8px) for inputs/buttons

buttons.style: Soft, pill-shaped or rounded-lg. No sharp edges.
buttons.primary: bg-primary text-white hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all

cards.style: Flat, white background, subtle border (border-slate-100), soft shadow (shadow-sm).

inputs.style: bg-slate-50 border-transparent focus:bg-white focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 transition-all

booking_wizard.style: Step-by-step flow. Current step highlighted. Previous steps accessible. Clean transitions.

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or modal overlays. backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80.
visual_enhancers.gradients: NO full screen gradients. Use subtle mesh gradients in hero backgrounds if needed (opacity 5-10%).

hero_bg.alt: Modern minimalist salon interior with mirrors and warm lighting
hero_bg.usage: Landing page hero background, Booking page side panel

service_barber.usage: Service selection card, Staff profile placeholder

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. UPDATE CSS VARIABLES: Go to /app/frontend/src/index.css and replace the :root variables with the colors defined in this JSON.
2. INSTALL ICONS: Run 'npm install lucide-react' (or yarn add) if not present. Use Lucide icons for everything.
3. CREATE LAYOUTS: Build a 'DashboardLayout' (Sidebar + Topbar) and a 'BookingLayout' (Centered/Split view).
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: Customize Shadcn components (Button, Card, Input) in /app/frontend/src/components/ui to match the 'rounded-xl' and 'soft shadow' aesthetic.
5. MOCK DATA: Create a 'mockData.js' file for services, staff, and slots to populate the UI immediately.
6. ROUTING: Set up React Router for / (Landing), /book/:businessId (Booking), /admin (Dashboard), /login.
7. CRITICAL: Ensure the Booking Page is mobile-responsive. The date picker must work perfectly on small screens.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style

Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions. Static = dead.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
